name: algosigner
author: https://developer.purestake.io
description: Sign Algorand transactions in your browser with PureStake.

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run buildcommon && npm run buildcrypto && npm run buildui && npm run buildextension && npm run builddapp
scripts.buildcommon: cd ./packages/common && npm install --loglevel=error  && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.buildcrypto: cd ./packages/crypto && npm install --loglevel=error && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.buildextension: cd ./packages/extension && npm install --loglevel=error && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.builddapp: cd ./packages/dapp && npm install --loglevel=error && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.buildui: cd ./packages/ui && npm install --loglevel=error && npm run build && cd ../..
